channel.title: Not sure what to do... Sorry for bothering you all
channel.description:
Hi everyone, I just downloaded moparscape and I'm REALLY looking forward to using it. Anyway, I've extracted all the files (Cache, Midi, etc.) into one file on desktop. However, when I click the "Run Moparscape" icon, the black text box comes up, it says error downloading news, which I've heard is alright, but then when the client pops up, it says the following.
Sorry, an error has occured while loading Moparscape, to fix try the following in order:
1. Try closing all web browsers and reloading. 2. Try clearing your web browser's cache from tools- internet options. 3. Try using a different game world (I'm not sure how to do that on MoparScape) 4. Try rebooting your computer. 5. Try selecting a different version of Java from the play game menu.
Now I've done number 1, 2, and 4. I'm just not sure what to do, and any help would be greatly appreciated, thanks.
Maxfelgar.

item.title: Not sure what to do... Sorry for bothering you all
item.dc:creator: @james james
item.description:
@james wrote:

download the latest jdk maybe?

Read full topic
item.source: Not sure what to do... Sorry for bothering you all

item.title: Not sure what to do... Sorry for bothering you all
item.dc:creator: @Maxfelgar Maxfelgar
item.description:
@Maxfelgar wrote:

Hi everyone, I just downloaded moparscape and I’m REALLY looking forward to using it. Anyway, I’ve extracted all the files (Cache, Midi, etc.) into one file on desktop. However, when I click the “Run Moparscape” icon, the black text box comes up, it says error downloading news, which I’ve heard is alright, but then when the client pops up, it says the following.

Sorry, an error has occured while loading Moparscape, to fix try the following in order:

  1. Try closing all web browsers and reloading.
  2. Try clearing your web browser’s cache from tools- internet options.
  3. Try using a different game world (I’m not sure how to do that on MoparScape)
  4. Try rebooting your computer.
  5. Try selecting a different version of Java from the play game menu.

Now I’ve done number 1, 2, and 4. I’m just not sure what to do, and any help would be greatly appreciated, thanks.

Maxfelgar.
